mapper.sql: hi.id, hi.create_date as createDate, hi.modify_date as modifyDate, hi.butler_id as butlerId, hi.house_id as houseId, hi.integral, hi.member_id as memberId, hi.star, hi.status, hi.worker_id as workerId, hi.data_status as dataStatus, hi.briefed
mapper.select: SELECT , CONCAT( h.residential, IFNULL(h.building, '*'), '栋', (case h.unit when (null or '') then '' else CONCAT(h.unit,'单元') end ), IFNULL(h.number, '*'), '号' ) houseName FROM `dj_worker_work_integral` hi INNER JOIN dj_house h ON hi.house_id = h.id WHERE hi.worker_id = #{workerId} ORDER BY hi.create_date DESC
